issue.title: [Release] Exercise source verification builds on a nightly basis
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to update the verification scripts to support specific git revisions without checking the signatures, then we can simply submit the verification tasks using crossbow.

cc `[~kou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483?focusedCommentId=17483515) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
It's a good idea!

We'll be able to prepare a source archive for specific revision by `dev/release/01-prepare.sh` and `dev/release/02-source.sh` easily.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483?focusedCommentId=17483728) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
I  have a simpler approach in mind: enable to run the verification scripts on git revisions, see the pull request.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483?focusedCommentId=17483988) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Ah, it will work too.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483?focusedCommentId=17500894) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
We should include this to the patch release as well so we can exercise the verification scripts before cutting the release candidates.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15483?focusedCommentId=17501823) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12320
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12320>
